DOC.brief_summary: This 20-week clinical trial participant primary hypercholesterolemia mixed dyslipidemia demonstrate effect MK-0524B compare MK-0524A + Simvastatin lipid value .
DOC.criteria: primary hypercholesterolemia mix dyslipidemia base medical history ( previous diagnosis ) , historic lipid value , otherwise determine optional lipid measurement screen visit meet one follow triglyceride ( TG ) criterion : 1. niacin , statin , fibrate TG < 500 mg/dL within 6 month washout 2. lipid alter therapy lipid alter therapy niacin , statin , fibrate TG < 600 mg/dL within 6 month screen high risk ( coronary heart disease [ CHD ] CHD risk equivalent ) AND statin pregnant breastfeeding , expect conceive study include 14day post study followup Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus statin therapy , poorly control , newly diagnose ( within 3 month Visit 1 ) , recently experience repeat hypoglycemia unstable glycemic control take new recently adjust antidiabetic medication ( exception +/ 10 unit insulin ) within 3 month Visit 1 follow condition : chronic heart failure , uncontrolled/unstable cardiac arrhythmia , unstable hypertension , active chronic hepatobiliary disorder hepatic disease , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) positive , gout ( within 1 year )
